Player History
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 4/1/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $328,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 5/1/1986, off John Butcher (SD)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/2/1986, off Andy Hawkins (SD)...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,621,429 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against Atlanta on 9/19/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/1988, hitting .480 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,950,000 through salary arbitration...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Montreal on 4/20/1989...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,950,000 through salary arbitration...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Los Angeles on 6/16/1990...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Had 6 hits with 3 RBI against Montreal on 7/11/1990...
10/6/1990: Signed a contract extension with Cincinnati, $7,500,000 per year, for 5 years.
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 1990...
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 1990...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Los Angeles on 4/3/1991...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 1991...
Injured on 3/9/1992 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Hit for the cycle against Los Angeles on 9/7/1992...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/1992, hitting .636 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Montreal on 9/18/1992...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/1992, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
